version_description: Commanders! This update contains the bug fixes necessary for a smooth combat experience. Download it immediately and head back onto the battlefield.
Fix to the Facebook Friends leaderboard issue that some Commanders were experiencing.

Commanders! A new update is here. Check out the brief below while you download before heading back on to the battlefield.

NEW LOOK
We’ve overhauled Iron Force’s entire user interface based on feedback and suggestions from your fellow Commanders

NEW ACCOUNT SYSTEM
Manage your Iron Force accounts with ease from the ‘Account’ tab in the Options menu

NEW TUTORIAL
An overhauled tutorial to help new players get onto the battlefield

Commander, we have a quick-fire update ready to deploy:
*Revised tutorial: learn how to access your profile easily
*Minor changes to flags

• You can now see a rank list in user profiles
• Active Decal and Patterns are displayed on the main menu
• Battle HUD Optimisation
Thanks for playing Iron Force, Commanders. This update fixes an issue a limited number of people have encountered.

NEW MAP
Commanders, welcome to our new battlefield set in a disused steel foundry. Where mighty flames once forged pure steel now iron rules as legions take on legions and tanks take on tanks in this industrial wasteland.

NEW MINI PACK
OUR BEST VALUE PACK YET includes a 2 Day Gold Medal and a 2 Day Pattern that will boost your fire speed. Please note that once purchased the Mini Pack cannot be purchased again for a period of two weeks.

NEW TANKS
Commanders, we are proud to see three new tanks rumble onto the battlefield with all new TIER 6 tanks. From the intimidating CENTAURUS to the futuristic deadly FORNAX and the mighty SERPENS, these machines are going to cast deadly new shadows on the field of war!

HALL OF FAME
A whole new way to celebrate our mighty Commanders! If you can take on the best and emerge victorious you could forge your immortality and take your place in the HALL OF FAME! Both Legions and individual Commanders will get the chance to be placed amongst the elite so take to your tanks now and start earning your place.

WEEKLY CHALLENGE
The all new WEEKLY CHALLENGES will test your reactions and push your battlefield tactics to the limit!

Commanders! It’s time to ‘Tech-up’ your Tanks!

This update introduces a complete overhaul of the ‘Technologies’ system and makes Blueprints much more accessible to all levels of Commanders:
• Introducing the all new ‘Air Strike’ Technology - target an enemy and watch as destruction reigns from the sky
• Get a FREE Blueprint everyday from the shop
• Find more FREE Blueprints in Ammo Boxes 

PLUS
• Enhanced help for first time players in the new tutorial
• All new starter pack offers better value

NEW TECH
Commanders, there’s a new technology in town, this time it’s the powerful ACTIVE PROTECTION SYSTEM which repels enemy attacks. Remember to collect your free Blueprints from the store every day!

FLAGGED FOR DESTRUCTION UPDATE
That’s right Commanders, you can now design and deploy your very own Legion flag onto the battlefield – it’s time to show your true colours! And that’s not all, you spoke and we listened and so this update is packed with Legion support:
Create your own Legion flag
Medals replaced by the all new ELITE system
Request Blueprints from your Legion comrades
New mail box – receive messages, collect bonus prizes and more
New UI makes it even easier to be in a Legion

FLAGGED FOR DESTRUCTION UPDATE
That’s right Commanders, you can now design and deploy your very own Legion flag onto the battlefield – it’s time to show your true colours! And that’s not all, you spoke and we listened and so this update is packed with Legion support:
Create your own Legion flag
Medals replaced by the all new ELITE system
Request Blueprints from your Legion comrades
New mail box – receive messages, collect bonus prizes and more
New UI makes it even easier to be in a Legion

Commanders, based on your feedback we’ve made some changes that will make Iron Force a more competitive experience for all players.  

Changes include:
Increased attributes on the majority of tanks
Rebalancing of Technologies
Prestige tanks, Monoceros and Serpens, become even more deadly

For more details search ‘Iron Force’ at EA Answers HQ (answers.ea.com)

WELCOME TO GLOBAL CONFLICT.
Play for your legion, battle for your nation!

• All-new Legion Vs Legion tournament
• Play in 3v3 or 2v2 Death Matches
• Represent your nation and battle for the prestigious Global Conflict Legion Badge
• Compete to dominate Regional Leaderboards
• Qualify for the Global Conflict Champions league to become champions

Commanders, we’ve heard your feedback and have designed an update just for you! Get ready, because:

• 4v4 battles are almost ready to return to Iron Force – look out for test events in game and help us bring them back
• Now you can turn paradise into a battlefield with the highly anticipated return of the Island Map

We’ve also made behind-the-scenes server enhancements to keep you in the fight. Thanks for playing. Now, get back into the action!

Commanders, we’ve heard your feedback and have designed an update just for you! Get ready, because:

• Now you can turn paradise into a battlefield with the highly anticipated return of the Island Map

We’ve also made behind-the-scenes server enhancements to keep you in the fight. Thanks for playing. Now, get back into the action!

Commanders, we’ve heard your feedback and have designed an update just for you! Get ready, because:

• Now you can turn paradise into a battlefield with the highly anticipated return of the Island Map

We’ve also made behind-the-scenes server enhancements to keep you in the fight. Thanks for playing. Now, get back into the action!

Commanders! We’ve just deployed the explosive Champions update. Download it now and discover the Champions Tournament, a new way to compete where you can fight for your Legion’s honor (open to T4-T6 players). You’ll earn funds, diamonds, and the chance to buy the mighty T6 Cepheus Tank, which boasts increased fire speed when your armor is low. Plus, the powerful T6 Sagitta Tank is now available, delivering increased damage to your opponents’ weak spots.

Get back into to the action as master of the battlefield! Thanks for playing.
Commanders! This update contains the bug fixes necessary for a smooth combat experience. Download it immediately and head back onto the battlefield.

Commanders! Download our latest update to:
• Activate the new Afterglow effects to boost your stats 
• Earn Challenge Points chests in Event Challenge mode to get the AG Shards needed to activate Afterglow
• Squad up with your legion in the optimized Team Battle mode 
• Switch and customize your tank quickly from the Battle Select screen
• Be the first to play the new 2v2v2v2 game mode and earn Legion Funds
Thanks for playing!

Commanders, prepare for war in our latest update and:
• Prove your legion’s dominance when you conquer territories and reap rewards in our Empire Wars event
• Become a triple threat: Fight it out on the new village map in 3v3v3 legion battles
• Build your Battalion with three powerful new tanks (Tier 3 Vela, Tier 5 Lyra, and Tier 6 Cygnus)
• Upgrade your Weapons when you obtain Arms Tokens – visit the Arms Dealer to boost your arsenal and unlock S-Model tanks
Thanks for playing!

Hey Commanders!

Update now and join the battle in an experience fully optimized for iPhoneX.

We’ve also made some behind-the-scenes enhancements, including optimizations to our battle server to keep your game
running smoothly and changes to reflect the requirements of the new General Data Protection Regulation in the EU.

Thanks for playing!

Hey Commanders! Celebrate five years of Iron Force in our latest update and:

• Unlock two brand-new T6 tanks, the tactical Canis and the defense focused Auriga
• Earn six new exclusive Legion Badges and two new Afterglows from Empire Wars
• Collect items and earn special rewards in our fifth Anniversary event
• Plus, we’ve simplified the Empire Wars process to get you into the fight with ease

Thanks for being part of the Iron Force family for the past five years!

Hey Commanders,

We’ve made some behind-the-scenes enhancements including device optimizations to keep your game running smoothly.

Thanks for playing!
Commanders! This update contains the bug fixes necessary for a smooth combat experience. Download it immediately and head back onto the battlefield.

Hey Commanders,

Fall is here and the temperatures are dipping, but the battle is just heating up! Update now and:
• Get into the Halloween spirit and earn frightfully awesome rewards in our spooky new collect event
• Receive special deals tailored just for you with our new Personal offers system
• We’ve also made some behind-the-scenes enhancements including device optimizations to keep your game running smoothly

Thanks for playing!

Hey Commanders,

We’ve made some behind-the-scenes enhancements including device optimizations to keep your game running smoothly.

Thanks for playing!

Happy holidays, Commanders! 

Get into the spirit of the season and make your fight festive. Update now to:

• Cause some merry mayhem on the snow-covered townlet map 
• Gift yourself awesome rewards in our colossal Christmas scavenger mission

Thanks for playing!
Commanders! We've fixed an issue with Pattern, Decal and Afterglow expiry causing instability for some players. Thanks for playing.

Prepare for the biggest Iron Force update of the year, including a brand-new arena, game mode, rewards to earn, and more, including:

• New Map: Compound – Return to the desert with Compound and go to war at a crossroads in an abandoned town. Tight corners and multiple angles of approach give skilled Tankers the perfect opportunity to ambush unsuspecting foes.
• New Event: Occupation – Two teams fight for single, central point control, with the first team to reach 100 declared the winner. Special prizes include the all-new Upgrade Skips.
• Centaurus Lancer Skin – Revisiting the original Tier 6, the Centaurus is the next Tank to get its own skin, available from in-game Flip Card events.
• Vela Festive Skin – The first Tier 5 to get a Skin, the Vela’s Festive Skin will also be available from in-game Flip Card events.
• New Rewards: Upgrade Skips – Earn Upgrade Skips from Occupation and use them to reduce research time from your active Upgrade.

See you on the battlefield!
Hey, Commanders! We’ve fixed some issues for the Empire Wars event in this update. Thanks for playing.

Hey, Commanders! As part of this update, you’ll find: 
• An all-new T6 tank, the L.CANIS – this variant of the Empire Wars test season trophy tank is now available in the arms dealer
• A stats boost for Trophy CANIS, ensuring the Trophy CANIS and L.CANIS can stand side-by-side on the battlefield
• Behind-the-scenes server enhancements to keep your game running smoothly
Thanks for playing!

Hey Commanders! As part of this update, you'll find:
• A new empire wars Trophy tank, the Delphinus - this Empire Wars Season 9 to 16 trophy tank packs a powerful punch with the all-new Aftershock special ability.
• Optimisation for the iPad PRO
• Behind-the-scenes server enhancements to keep your game running smoothly
Thanks for playing!

Hey Commanders! As part of this update, you'll find:
• A new empire wars Trophy tank, the Delphinus - this Empire Wars Season 9 to 16 trophy tank packs a powerful punch with the all-new Aftershock special ability.
• Optimisation for the iPad PRO
• Behind-the-scenes server enhancements to keep your game running smoothly
Thanks for playing!
Hey, Commanders! We’ve fixed some issues for the Empire Wars event in this update. Thanks for playing.

Commanders! Welcome to Iron Force version 2.12.1, the Legendary Skins update!

As part of this update, you'll find:
• Legendary Skins - Earn Shards through the Champions Tournament + events to unlock stat boosting Skins. Starting with the veteran Serpens and fan favourite Auriga!
• The return of Freight Yard! - As voted for by the Iron Force community, Island will be removed and Freight Yard will be opened up again.
• Improved suspicious activity checker

Thanks for playing!
Commanders! We've fixed an issue with Pattern, Decal and Afterglow expiry causing instability for some players. Thanks for playing.

Prepare for the biggest Iron Force update of the year, including a brand-new arena, game mode, rewards to earn, and more, including:

• New Map: Compound – Return to the desert with Compound and go to war at a crossroads in an abandoned town. Tight corners and multiple angles of approach give skilled Tankers the perfect opportunity to ambush unsuspecting foes.
• New Event: Occupation – Two teams fight for single, central point control, with the first team to reach 100 declared the winner. Special prizes include the all-new Upgrade Skips.
• Centaurus Lancer Skin – Revisiting the original Tier 6, the Centaurus is the next Tank to get its own skin, available from in-game Flip Card events.
• Vela Festive Skin – The first Tier 5 to get a Skin, the Vela’s Festive Skin will also be available from in-game Flip Card events.
• New Rewards: Upgrade Skips – Earn Upgrade Skips from Occupation and use them to reduce research time from your active Upgrade.

See you on the battlefield!

Iron Pass update! Battle to earn Iron Points that unlock rewards in Iron Pass Season One. Upgrade to the Premium pass for even greater rewards, including:
• New Tucana T5T tank shards – a new T-class with one extra blueprint slot
• Two Tucana skins and one Lacerta skin
• Tank ornaments to personalize your tanks
• Tons of other great rewards
Thanks for playing!

Welcome to our Tank Mastery Update! Find plenty of Tank updates, plus upgrades to the Exchange Store, and more. Now you can:
- Earn Mastery Points while driving certain Tanks to unlock their Special abilities to use as Technologies on other Tanks
- Upgrade these new Technologies using Upgrade Modules, available from the improved Exchange Store
- Complete Vela Mastery to unlock N20 regeneration and Cygnus Mastery to unlock the Mine regeneration Special Technologies
- Automatically receive full Mastery if you already own Vela and Cygnus Tanks when you update to v3.1 – mastery will be added to other Tanks in future updates
- Sort Tanks in the Garage by their Tier
- Find the newly added Blueprints section in the Exchange Store
- Trade in your unwanted Blueprints for Tech Tokens, which you can exchange for the Blueprints you need or Upgrade Modules
- Trade Tank Tokens for new Mastery Modules

We’ve also balanced the Aftershock ability on the Delphinus and the L. Delphinus. It will now continue to countdown and detonate, even if your Tank is destroyed during the countdown. Thanks for playing!

Welcome to our Tank Mastery Update! Find plenty of Tank updates, plus upgrades to the Exchange Store, and more. Now you can:
- Earn Mastery Points while driving certain Tanks to unlock their Special abilities to use as Technologies on other Tanks
- Upgrade these new Technologies using Upgrade Modules, available from the improved Exchange Store
- Complete Vela Mastery to unlock N20 regeneration and Cygnus Mastery to unlock the Mine regeneration Special Technologies
- Automatically receive full Mastery if you already own Vela and Cygnus Tanks when you update to v3.1 – mastery will be added to other Tanks in future updates
- Sort Tanks in the Garage by their Tier
- Find the newly added Blueprints section in the Exchange Store
- Trade in your unwanted Blueprints for Tech Tokens, which you can exchange for the Blueprints you need or Upgrade Modules
- Trade Tank Tokens for new Mastery Modules
We’ve also balanced the Aftershock ability on the Delphinus and the L. Delphinus. It will now continue to countdown and detonate, even if your Tank is destroyed during the countdown. Thanks for playing!

Hey, Commanders!
As part of this update, you'll find:
- An all-new class of Tank, the Tier 6T – Like the Tier 5T Tucana before it, this new class of Tanks has three Passive Technology slots.
- New Garage Decorations – Find these in the new Lucky Spin Machine to personalise your Garage and give your Upgrade speeds a boost!
See you on the Battlefield!

Hey Commanders,

We’ve made some behind-the-scenes enhancements including device optimizations to keep your game running smoothly.

Thanks for playing!

Hey, Commanders! As part of this update, you’ll find: 

- An all-new T6 tank, the Cetus!

Thanks for playing and we'll see you on the battlefield!

Commanders!

Update your game now and prepare for Season 4 of the Iron Pass!

The Premium Pass includes:

- A new Tank Skin for the Cepheus
- Two new Battle Flags
- Two new Tank Ornaments

We're also implementing an anti-AFK feature to make sure everyone on the battlefield keeps fighting until the end!

See you on the Battlefield!

Behind-the-scenes server enhancements to keep your game running smoothly

Thanks for playing!
